quiz.question: _____ philatelist
quiz.explanation: 集邮家, 邮票集邮家. The stamp philatelist collected rare postage items. 邮票集邮家收集稀有邮政物品。

quiz.question: pugilist ________
quiz.explanation: 拳击手, 拳击冠军. The pugilist champion defended his title successfully. 拳击冠军成功卫冕。

quiz.question: enlist _______
quiz.explanation: 征募; 争取, 争取支持. The campaign will enlist support from local businesses. 该活动将争取当地企业的支持。

quiz.question: _______ extremist
quiz.explanation: 极端主义者, 暴力极端主义者. The violent extremist was arrested by authorities. 暴力极端主义者被当局逮捕。

quiz.question: ____ optimist
quiz.explanation: 乐观主义者, 天生的乐观主义者. She is a born optimist who sees the bright side. 她是一个天生的乐观主义者,总看到光明的一面。

quiz.question: _____ taxonomist
quiz.explanation: 分类学家, 植物分类学家. The plant taxonomist identified new species. 植物分类学家鉴定了新物种。

quiz.question: ______ conformist
quiz.explanation: 墨守成规者, 社会墨守成规者. The social conformist follows all societal norms. 社会墨守成规者遵循所有社会规范。

quiz.question: ______ nonconformist
quiz.explanation: 不墨守成规者, 社会不墨守成规者. The social nonconformist rejected traditional values. 社会不墨守成规者拒绝传统价值观。

quiz.question: hedonist _________
quiz.explanation: 享乐主义者, 享乐主义生活方式. He pursued a hedonist lifestyle focused on pleasure. 他追求以快乐为中心的享乐主义生活方式。

quiz.question: _____ protagonist
quiz.explanation: 主角; 主要人物, 故事主角. The story protagonist overcomes many obstacles. 故事主角克服了许多障碍。

quiz.question: ____ percussionist
quiz.explanation: 打击乐器演奏者, 爵士打击乐器演奏者. The jazz percussionist kept perfect rhythm. 爵士打击乐器演奏者保持完美的节奏。

quiz.question: podiatrist ______
quiz.explanation: 足病医生, 足病医生诊所. The podiatrist clinic treats foot problems. 足病医生诊所治疗足部问题。

quiz.question: wrist _____
quiz.explanation: 手腕, 腕表. He wore an expensive wrist watch. 他戴着昂贵的腕表。

quiz.question: subsist __ ____
quiz.explanation: 生存; 维持生活, 靠大米生存. Poor farmers subsist on rice and vegetables. 贫困农民靠大米和蔬菜生存。

quiz.question: ____-________ narcissist
quiz.explanation: 自恋者, 自我陶醉的自恋者. The self-absorbed narcissist only cared about himself. 自我陶醉的自恋者只关心自己。

quiz.question: defeatist ________
quiz.explanation: 失败主义的; 失败主义者, 失败主义态度. His defeatist attitude prevented him from trying. 他的失败主义态度阻止了他尝试。

quiz.question: ____ numismatist
quiz.explanation: 钱币收藏家, 热心的钱币收藏家. The keen numismatist collected ancient coins. 热心的钱币收藏家收集古钱币。

quiz.question: ____-________ egotist
quiz.explanation: 自我中心者, 自我中心的自我中心者. The self-centered egotist talked only about himself. 自我中心的自我中心者只谈论自己。

quiz.question: accost _ ________
quiz.explanation: 搭讪; 勾引, 搭讪路人. A stranger tried to accost a passerby on the street. 一个陌生人试图在街上搭讪路人。

quiz.question: nethermost _______
quiz.explanation: 最低的; 最深的, 最深的区域. They explored the nethermost regions of the cave. 他们探索了洞穴最深的区域。

quiz.question: compost ____
quiz.explanation: 堆肥, 堆肥堆. The garden has a compost heap for organic waste. 花园有一个堆肥堆用于有机废物。

quiz.question: ______ cloudburst
quiz.explanation: 暴雨; 突然大雨, 突然暴雨. A sudden cloudburst flooded the streets. 突然暴雨淹没了街道。

quiz.question: _______ holocaust
quiz.explanation: 大屠杀; 浩劫, 核浩劫. Scientists warned of a nuclear holocaust. 科学家警告核浩劫。

quiz.question: exhaust _________
quiz.explanation: 耗尽; 使疲惫, 耗尽资源. Don't exhaust resources through wasteful practices. 不要通过浪费行为耗尽资源。

quiz.question: __ bust
quiz.explanation: 破产; 半身像, 破产. The company will go bust without new funding. 没有新资金,公司将破产。

quiz.question: locust _____
quiz.explanation: 蝗虫, 蝗虫群. A locust swarm destroyed the crops. 蝗虫群摧毁了庄稼。

quiz.question: sawdust _____
quiz.explanation: 锯末, 锯末地板. The workshop had a sawdust floor. 车间有锯末地板。

quiz.question: gust __ ____
quiz.explanation: 阵风, 一阵风. A strong gust of wind blew the door open. 一阵强风吹开了门。

quiz.question: ____ disgust
quiz.explanation: 厌恶; 反感, 感到厌恶. The cruel behavior made people feel disgust. 残忍的行为使人们感到厌恶。

quiz.question: august ________
quiz.explanation: 威严的; 令人敬畏的, 威严的存在. The king had an august presence. 国王有威严的存在。

quiz.question: adjust ________
quiz.explanation: 调整; 适应, 调整设置. Please adjust settings to your preferences. 请根据您的偏好调整设置。

quiz.question: lust ___ _____
quiz.explanation: 渴望; 色欲, 对权力的渴望. His lust for power corrupted him completely. 他对权力的渴望完全腐蚀了他。

quiz.question: wanderlust ______
quiz.explanation: 旅行癖; 漫游癖, 漫游精神. She possessed a wanderlust spirit and traveled widely. 她拥有漫游精神,广泛旅行。

quiz.question: oust ____ ______
quiz.explanation: 驱逐; 罢免, 从职位上罢免. The board voted to oust from office the CEO. 董事会投票将首席执行官从职位上罢免。

quiz.question: _____'_ crust
quiz.explanation: 外壳; 地壳, 地壳. The earth's crust is relatively thin. 地壳相对较薄。

quiz.question: thrust _______
quiz.explanation: 推; 刺, 向前推进. The army will thrust forward into enemy territory. 军队将向前推进到敌方领土。

quiz.question: amethyst ________
quiz.explanation: 紫水晶, 紫水晶项链. She wore a beautiful amethyst necklace. 她戴着一条美丽的紫水晶项链。

quiz.question: ___ ___ butt
quiz.explanation: 臀部; 烟蒂, 击中靶心. The archer will hit the butt with precision. 弓箭手将精确地击中靶心。

quiz.question: _________ juggernaut
quiz.explanation: 不可阻挡的力量, 企业巨头. The corporate juggernaut dominates the market. 企业巨头主导市场。

quiz.question: abut ___ _____
quiz.explanation: 邻接; 毗连, 毗邻河流. Their property will abut the river on one side. 他们的财产一侧将毗邻河流。

quiz.question: _____ debut
quiz.explanation: 初次登台; 首次亮相, 舞台首演. The actress made her stage debut at age 20. 女演员在20岁时首次登台演出。

quiz.question: woodcut _____
quiz.explanation: 木刻; 木版画, 木刻版画. The museum displays ancient woodcut print. 博物馆展示古代木刻版画。

quiz.question: undercut ___ _____
quiz.explanation: 削价竞争; 削弱, 削价. Competitors will undercut the price to win customers. 竞争对手会削价以赢得客户。

quiz.question: ________ hut
quiz.explanation: 小屋; 棚屋, 山间小屋. Hikers rested in the mountain hut overnight. 徒步旅行者在山间小屋过夜休息。

quiz.question: ____ glut
quiz.explanation: 过剩; 供过于求, 食物过剩. The harvest created a food glut in the market. 丰收在市场上造成了食物过剩。

quiz.question: ____ gamut
quiz.explanation: 全部; 整个范围, 全部范围. The exhibition runs the full gamut of modern art. 展览涵盖了现代艺术的全部范围。

quiz.question: ______ bout
quiz.explanation: 回合; 一场, 拳击比赛. The boxing bout lasted twelve rounds. 拳击比赛持续了十二回合。

quiz.question: roundabout _____
quiz.explanation: 环形交叉路; 迂回的, 迂回路线. We took a roundabout route to avoid traffic. 我们走迂回路线以避免交通拥堵。

quiz.question: _______ lout
quiz.explanation: 粗人; 笨蛋, 粗鲁的粗人. The boorish lout offended everyone at the party. 粗鲁的粗人冒犯了聚会上的每个人。

quiz.question: pout ____
quiz.explanation: 撅嘴; 生气, 撅起嘴唇. Children often pout lips when disappointed. 孩子们失望时常常撅起嘴唇。

quiz.question: _ rout
quiz.explanation: 溃败; 彻底击败, 一场溃败. The battle ended in a rout of the enemy. 战斗以敌人的溃败告终。

quiz.question: tout _ _______
quiz.explanation: 兜售; 吹捧, 兜售产品. Advertisers tout a product as revolutionary. 广告商兜售产品称其具有革命性。

quiz.question: stout _____
quiz.explanation: 粗壮的; 结实的, 结实的体格. The wrestler had a stout build. 摔跤手有结实的体格。

quiz.question: devout ________
quiz.explanation: 虔诚的, 虔诚的信徒. She is a devout believer who prays daily. 她是一位每天祈祷的虔诚信徒。

quiz.question: ____ plateau
quiz.explanation: 高原; 平稳期, 高原. The high plateau stretches for miles. 高原绵延数英里。

quiz.question: _____ purlieu
quiz.explanation: 范围; 郊区, 乡村地区. They lived in the rural purlieu outside the city. 他们住在城市外的乡村地区。

quiz.question: ____ guru
quiz.explanation: 大师; 权威, 技术大师. The tech guru founded several startups. 技术大师创立了几家初创公司。

quiz.question: impromptu ______
quiz.explanation: 即兴的, 即兴演讲. She delivered an impromptu speech at the event. 她在活动中发表了即兴演讲。

quiz.question: ______ thaw
quiz.explanation: 解冻; 融化, 春季解冻. The spring thaw melts the snow. 春季解冻融化了雪。

quiz.question: _____ flaw
quiz.explanation: 缺陷; 瑕疵, 致命缺陷. The plan had a fatal flaw that doomed it. 该计划有一个注定失败的致命缺陷。

quiz.question: withdraw ____
quiz.explanation: 取出; 撤回, 取现金. You can withdraw cash from the ATM. 你可以从自动取款机取现金。

quiz.question: jigsaw ______
quiz.explanation: 拼图, 拼图游戏. Children enjoy solving jigsaw puzzle. 孩子们喜欢解拼图游戏。

quiz.question: yaw _____
quiz.explanation: 偏航, 偏航误差. The pilot corrected the yaw error. 飞行员纠正了偏航误差。

quiz.question: ____ curfew
quiz.explanation: 宵禁, 城市宵禁. The city curfew begins at midnight. 城市宵禁从午夜开始。

quiz.question: eschew ________
quiz.explanation: 避免; 戒绝, 避免暴力. Peaceful protesters eschew violence completely. 和平抗议者完全避免暴力。

quiz.question: skew ____
quiz.explanation: 歪斜; 扭曲, 扭曲数据. Bias can skew data in research studies. 偏见会扭曲研究中的数据。

quiz.question: _ slew __ ______
quiz.explanation: 大量; 许多, 大量订单. The company received a slew of orders. 公司收到了大量订单。

quiz.question: ______ sinew
quiz.explanation: 肌腱; 力量, 肌肉肌腱. The athlete's muscle sinew was well developed. 运动员的肌肉肌腱发育良好。

quiz.question: _______ ___ screw
quiz.explanation: 螺丝, 拧紧螺丝. Use a screwdriver to tighten the screw. 用螺丝刀拧紧螺丝。

quiz.question: elbow ____
quiz.explanation: 肘部, 活动空间. The small office provides little elbow room. 小办公室几乎没有活动空间。

quiz.question: cow ____ _______
quiz.explanation: 威吓; 恐吓, 威吓使沉默. Threats cannot cow into silence brave journalists. 威胁无法威吓勇敢的记者使其沉默。

quiz.question: foreshadow ______
quiz.explanation: 预示; 预兆, 预示事件. Dark clouds foreshadow events of the storm. 乌云预示风暴事件。

quiz.question: overshadow ____________
quiz.explanation: 使黯然失色; 遮蔽, 使成就黯然失色. Don't let failure overshadow achievements. 不要让失败使成就黯然失色。

quiz.question: endow ____
quiz.explanation: 捐赠; 赋予, 捐赠基金. The philanthropist will endow fund for scholarships. 慈善家将为奖学金捐赠基金。

quiz.question: _________ know-how
quiz.explanation: 专门技术; 实践知识, 技术诀窍. Engineers possess technical know-how. 工程师拥有技术诀窍。

quiz.question: ________ sideshow
quiz.explanation: 杂耍; 附属活动, 嘉年华杂耍. The carnival sideshow attracted curious crowds. 嘉年华杂耍吸引了好奇的人群。

quiz.question: overflow ____
quiz.explanation: 溢出; 泛滥, 溢流罐. The overflow tank collects excess water. 溢流罐收集多余的水。

quiz.question: ____ glow
quiz.explanation: 发光; 光辉, 柔和的光辉. Candles cast a soft glow in the room. 蜡烛在房间里投射出柔和的光辉。

quiz.question: callow _____
quiz.explanation: 未成熟的; 无经验的, 未成熟的青年. The callow youth lacked worldly experience. 未成熟的青年缺乏世俗经验。

quiz.question: fallow _____
quiz.explanation: 休耕的; 荒芜的, 休耕田地. The farmer left the fallow field to recover. 农民让休耕田地恢复。

quiz.question: hallow ___ ______
quiz.explanation: 使神圣; 尊崇, 使土地神圣. They will hallow the ground with a ceremony. 他们将用仪式使土地神圣。

quiz.question: minnow ____
quiz.explanation: 小鱼; 小人物, 小鱼池塘. The minnow pond teems with tiny fish. 小鱼池塘里到处都是小鱼。

quiz.question: winnow ____
quiz.explanation: 筛选; 扬谷, 筛选数据. Researchers must winnow data to find patterns. 研究人员必须筛选数据以找到模式。

quiz.question: highbrow _______
quiz.explanation: 知识分子的; 高雅的, 高雅文化. The magazine covers highbrow culture and arts. 该杂志涵盖高雅文化和艺术。

quiz.question: overthrow _ ______
quiz.explanation: 推翻; 打倒, 推翻政权. Rebels attempted to overthrow a regime. 叛军试图推翻政权。

quiz.question: farrow _ ______
quiz.explanation: 产仔, 产一窝仔. The sow will farrow a litter in spring. 母猪将在春天产一窝仔。

quiz.question: harrow ___ _____
quiz.explanation: 耙地; 折磨, 耙地. Farmers harrow the field before planting. 农民在种植前耙地。

quiz.question: ____ marrow
quiz.explanation: 骨髓; 精髓, 骨髓. Bone marrow produces blood cells. 骨髓产生血细胞。

quiz.question: sow _____
quiz.explanation: 播种, 播种种子. Spring is the time to sow seeds. 春天是播种种子的时候。

quiz.question: bestow _____
quiz.explanation: 授予; 给予, 授予荣誉. The university will bestow honor on the graduate. 大学将授予毕业生荣誉。

quiz.question: avow _____
quiz.explanation: 承认; 公开宣称, 承认罪责. The defendant chose to avow guilt. 被告选择承认罪责。

quiz.question: disavow _________
quiz.explanation: 否认; 拒绝承认, 否认知情. The official will disavow knowledge of the scandal. 官员将否认知情这起丑闻。

quiz.question: flax _____
quiz.explanation: 亚麻, 亚麻纤维. Linen is made from flax fiber. 亚麻布由亚麻纤维制成。

quiz.question: _____ _ climax
quiz.explanation: 高潮; 顶点, 达到高潮. The tension will reach a climax in the final act. 紧张气氛将在最后一幕达到高潮。

quiz.question: ____ anticlimax
quiz.explanation: 反高潮; 虎头蛇尾, 情节反高潮. The ending was a disappointing plot anticlimax. 结局是令人失望的情节反高潮。

quiz.question: ________ apex
quiz.explanation: 顶点; 最高点, 山顶. Climbers reached the mountain apex at noon. 登山者在中午到达山顶。

quiz.question: ________ vertex
quiz.explanation: 顶点; 角的顶点, 三角形顶点. The triangle vertex is labeled point A. 三角形顶点标记为A点。

quiz.question: vex ___ ______
quiz.explanation: 使烦恼; 使恼怒, 使公众烦恼. The controversy will vex the public for months. 这场争议将使公众烦恼数月。

quiz.question: convex ______
quiz.explanation: 凸的; 凸面的, 凸面镜. The convex mirror provides a wide view. 凸面镜提供广阔的视野。

quiz.question: prolix ______
quiz.explanation: 冗长的; 啰嗦的, 冗长的演讲. His prolix speech bored the audience. 他冗长的演讲使观众感到厌烦。
